mapper.insert: insert into hz_questions (id, answers_num, answer, `type`, `level`, `state`, course_id, test_id, create_user, create_time, times, knowledge_id, question, answers, analysis ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answersNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{answers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update hz_questions set answers_num = #{answersNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, answers = #{answers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, analysis = #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, answers_num, answer, `type`, `level`, `state`, course_id, test_id, create_user, create_time, times, knowledge_id, question, answers, analysis from hz_questions where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, answers_num, answer, `type`, `level`, `state`, course_id, test_id, create_user, create_time, times, knowledge_id, question, answers, analysis from hz_questions
